com.github.hakandundar34coding.mini-system-monitor.desktop com.github.hakandundar34coding.mini-system-monitor.desktop CC0-1.0 Mini System Monitor GPL-3.0 Provides information about CPU, RAM, Disk, Network performance. <url type="https://github.com/hakandundar34coding/mini-system-monitor
Mini version of 'System Monitoring Center'.
Features:
Monitoring CPU, RAM, Disk, Network usage
Optimized for low CPU usage and fast start
Supports ARM architecture
Free and open source
